item0.name: Prowler's Claw
item0.description:
60 Attack Damage
21 Lethality
20 Ability Haste

Active - Sandswipe: Dash through target enemy, dealing (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. For the next 3 seconds, you deal 15% increased damage to the target. (60s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Lethality

item1.name: Edge of Night
item1.description:
50 Attack Damage
10 Lethality
325 Health
  • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

item2.name: Tear of the Goddess
item2.description:
240 Mana
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, up to a maximum of 360 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana doubled if the target is a champion.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Caulfield's Warhammer
item5.description:
25 Attack Damage
10 Ability Haste

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Electrocute
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

item0.name: Muramana
item0.description:
35 Attack Damage
860 Mana
15 Ability Haste
  • Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.
  • Shock: When targetting champions, Ability strikes and Attacks ( On-Hit) apply an additional (2.5% max Mana) physical damage.

item2.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
item2.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality

Active - Wraith Step: Gain 20% Move Speed and Ghosting for 6 seconds (45s cooldown).
  • Haunt: Gain 40 Move Speed out of combat.

    Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
item5.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
20 Ability Haste
  • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals an additional (65 + 25% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

item0.name: Doran's Shield
item0.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item1.name: Goredrinker
item1.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item2.name: Corrupting Potion
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item3.name: Mercury's Treads
item3.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item4.name: Cull
item4.description:
7 Attack Damage
  • Attacks restore 3 Health per hit.
  • Reap: Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold immediately and disables Reap.

item5.name: Tiamat
item5.description:
25 Attack Damage
  • Cleave: Attacks deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other nearby enemies.

    Minimum of (12% Attack Damage) damage to enemies furthest away.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item5.name: Control Ward
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.
